title: How can I apply for Jobs on GCash?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

- [How do I withdraw my earnings from Jobs on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41423213263769-How-do-I-withdraw-my-earnings-from-Jobs-on-GCash)
- [How can I apply for Jobs on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19171464377369-How-can-I-apply-for-Jobs-on-GCash)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Jobs is a new feature in the GCash app that allows users to **apply for job opportunities or earn extra income by referring someone to a job**. This feature is powered by **PasaJob**.

### **Eligibility**

To access the **Jobs** feature, you must meet the following requirements:

- Be a **Fully Verified** GCash user
- Be at least **18 years old**

### **How to apply for Jobs**

To access and apply for employment, follow the steps below:

1. Open the **GCash app**, tap **View All** **Services > Jobs**
2. Browse through available job opportunities or choose to refer someone for a job


![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41425456378265)

After you apply or successfully refer someone for a job, you will receive an email notification from **PasaJob**. These emails will be sent from the following official email addresses:

- [pasajob-alerts@pasajob.com](mailto:pasajob-alerts@pasajob.com)
- [team@pasajob.com](mailto:team@pasajob.com)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How do I refer someone for Jobs on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/23431265122969-Make-a-job-referral-on-Jobs)
- [How do I withdraw my earnings from Jobs on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41423213263769)
